synopsis.text: Whether she's a deer, a girl, or a peculiar blend of both, one thing's for sure - Nokotan's arrival spells the end of Torako's quiet, model student life! With her antlers and uncanny deer-like senses, the transfer student sniffs out Torako's hidden past as a delinquent, threatening to expose her secret to the world. From school to the zoo, chaos trails Nokotan's every move, leaving Torako with more questions than answers. As she grapples with her new reality, Torako must navigate the challenges that come with befriending such an unusual creature, all while trying to keep her past under wraps. Will she succeed, or will Nokotan's arrival turn her life upside down? Only time will tell in this whimsical and chaotic tale of friendship and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
